github.feedbackTooltip: Report bugs or suggest features on GitHub

cookie.bannerText: We use cookies to improve your experience. Do you allow us to use your data for Google Analytics and ads?

settings.title: Settings
settings.providersDesc: Enter your API keys. Keys are stored only in your browser, never sent to servers.
settings.mcpDesc: Model Context Protocol server connection status
settings.mcpBuiltinDesc: These servers are automatically attached to agents. Disable any you do not want to use.
settings.mcpCustomDesc: Add your own MCP servers. Assign them to agents from each agent's detail page.
settings.mcpCorsWarning: Connection fails? We'll auto-retry via proxy.
settings.mcpAssignAgentsDesc: Which agents should have access to this server?
settings.mcpNoCustomServers: No custom MCP servers added yet.
settings.mcpDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this MCP server?
settings.mcpHeadersHint: Headers as JSON. API keys stay in your browser.
settings.mcpHeadersInvalid: Headers must be valid JSON object
settings.macrosDesc: Recorded browser macros from the Chrome extension. Assign macros to agents from the agent edit panel.
settings.macrosNoServers: No macros yet. Record your first macro from the extension side panel.
settings.macrosNoTools: No macros in this server yet.
settings.automationBrowserForegroundDesc: When enabled, the automation browser window will appear in the foreground instead of opening behind the current window.
settings.chatStorageDesc: Your chats are stored locally on your device. Set limits to keep storage in check.
settings.chatMessageLimitHint: When exceeded, oldest messages are removed. 0 = no limit.
settings.chatHistoryLimitHint: When exceeded, oldest chats and their messages are removed. 0 = no limit.
settings.clearAllChatsDesc: Permanently delete all conversations across every agent.
settings.clearAllChatsConfirm: This will permanently delete all your chat history. This action cannot be undone.
settings.clearAgentChatsDesc: Select agents whose conversations you want to permanently delete.
settings.clearAgentChatsConfirm: All chats for the selected agents will be permanently deleted. This action cannot be undone.
settings.clearAgentChatsConfirmNames: All chats for {{agents}} will be permanently deleted. This action cannot be undone.

extension.requiredBanner: This agent uses browser automation tools. Install the Chrome extension to use them.

home.heroDescription: Deploy agents that deliver. Browser automation, domain search, and more. Use any AI model securely-no middleman, no fees, no data stored. Powered by real-world tools and macros via MCP.
home.demoTitle: Turn Any Browser Action & Data Extraction into an AI Tool in 60 Seconds
home.demoDesc: Watch how to create and run browser macros with izan.io
home.compSubtitle: Traditional AI assistants like OpenClaw install on your machine and control your entire computer - shell commands, file system, everything. izan.io takes a fundamentally different approach.
home.compServerlessDesc: No server to install, no CLI to configure, no dependencies to manage. Open izan.io in your browser and start working. That's it.
home.compSecurityTitle: Your Keys Never Leave Your Browser
home.compSecurityDesc: API keys are stored in your browser's IndexedDB - never sent to any server. No middleman, no data collection, no trust required.
home.compSandboxDesc: Traditional assistants get full shell access to your machine. izan.io only automates your browser - it can't read your files, run commands, or modify your system.
home.compOpenDesc: AGPL-3.0 licensed. Bring any of 17+ AI providers. Switch models freely. Your data, your rules, your agents.
home.compVsRow1Traditional: Install locally, configure CLI, manage dependencies
home.compVsRow2Traditional: Full computer control: shell, files, system
home.compVsRow3Izan: Browser IndexedDB only - never leaves your device
home.compVsRow4Traditional: Can execute any command on your machine
home.compVsRow5Izan: Visual macro recording, no code needed
home.compVsRow6Traditional: Needs open APIs or custom integrations
home.compVsRow6Izan: Log in normally - automate any site you can access
home.compAuthDesc: Just log into any website in your browser session and automate it. No MCP server needed, no open APIs required. If you can access it, izan.io can automate it.
home.compCtaTitle: Open izan.io. Install the extension. That's it.
home.compCtaDesc: No accounts, no servers, no configuration. Start automating in seconds.
home.featSectionTitle: Everything You Need to Build AI Workflows
home.featSectionDesc: From browser automation to scheduled tasks - all the tools to make AI agents work for you.
home.featAgentsTitle: AI Agent Platform with Multi-Agent Orchestration
home.featAgentsDesc: Chain multiple AI agents together for complex workflows. One agent delegates to others - research, analyze, and execute in parallel.
home.featBrowserTitle: Chrome Extension for AI Browser Automation
home.featBrowserDesc: Record browser interactions and replay them as AI tools. Click, type, scroll, navigate - all automated via the Chrome extension.
home.featProvidersDesc: OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, Mistral, Groq, and more. Bring your own API key - no vendor lock-in, no middleman fees.
home.featMcpTitle: MCP Protocol Client for the Web
home.featMcpDesc: Connect any MCP-compatible server to give agents access to custom tools and data sources. The first real web-based MCP client.
home.featMacrosDesc: Point-and-click macro recording. No code required. Agents execute your macros as tools to automate any website.
home.featScheduledDesc: Run agent tasks on a schedule - daily reports, price tracking, data collection. Set it once, let it run on autopilot.
home.featBackgroundDesc: Start complex research or multi-step workflows and let agents work in the background. Get notified when results are ready.
home.featPrivacyDesc: No account needed. API keys stored in your browser only. Fully open source under AGPL-3.0. Your data never leaves your device.
home.featBuilderDesc: Create custom agents with tailored prompts, tool configurations, and model parameters. Export and share with the community.
home.featExtractionDesc: Use browser macros to scrape structured data from any website. Agents parse, analyze, and transform extracted content.
home.agentShowcaseDesc: Specialized agents that go beyond simple chat. Each one is equipped with real-world tools to deliver actionable results.
home.agentDomainDesc: Creative domain name suggestions with instant availability checking. No API key required.
home.agentWebFetchDesc: Fetch any web page and read its content. Requires the browser extension.
home.agentPlayStoreDesc: Search and analyze apps on Google Play Store. Requires the browser extension.
home.agentXManagerDesc: Automate X/Twitter: post, like, retweet, follow, search, and scrape. Requires the browser extension.
home.agentLinkedInManagerDesc: Automate LinkedIn: search people, scrape profiles, connect, message, and find jobs. Requires the browser extension.
home.agentMapsScoutDesc: Automate Google Maps: search places, scrape details, read reviews, and export data. Requires the browser extension.
home.agentDiscordManagerDesc: Automate Discord: send messages, scrape channels, search, and manage servers. Requires the browser extension.
home.agentRedditManagerDesc: Automate Reddit: search posts, scrape subreddits, upvote, comment, and analyze users. Requires the browser extension.
home.agentJiraManagerDesc: Automate Jira: search issues, create tickets, manage sprints, and transition statuses. Requires the browser extension.
home.agentSlackManagerDesc: Automate Slack: send messages, search conversations, list channels, and set status. Requires the browser extension.
home.agentGitHubManagerDesc: Automate GitHub: search repos, scrape profiles, list issues/PRs, and star repos. Requires the browser extension.
home.agentNotionManagerDesc: Automate Notion: search pages, read content, manage databases, and export data. Requires the browser extension.
home.agentWhatsAppManagerDesc: Automate WhatsApp Web: send messages, search chats, scrape conversations, and manage contacts. Requires the browser extension.
home.agentTrelloManagerDesc: Automate Trello: manage boards, create cards, move between lists, and search. Requires the browser extension.
home.agentTelegramManagerDesc: Automate Telegram Web: search chats, send messages, scrape channels, and export conversations. Requires the browser extension.
home.agentSheetsAgentDesc: Automate Google Sheets: read and write cells, create spreadsheets, search Drive, and export CSV. Requires the browser extension.
home.agentYouTubeAgentDesc: Automate YouTube: search videos, scrape channels, read comments, and browse playlists. Requires the browser extension.
home.agentSpotifyManagerDesc: Automate Spotify: search music, scrape playlists, browse artists, and play tracks. Requires the browser extension.
home.agentAirtableAgentDesc: Automate Airtable: list bases, scrape tables, create records, and manage views. Requires the browser extension.
home.agentFigmaAgentDesc: Automate Figma: list files, scrape designs, read comments, and browse components. Requires the browser extension.
home.agentMoreDesc: Trading, sports, news, shopping - new agents are always being built by us and the community.
home.step1Desc: Pick from OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, and 17+ providers. Use your own API key.
home.step2Desc: Add the Chrome extension to unlock browser automation, macros, and web data extraction.
home.step3Desc: Choose a specialized agent for your task - domains, search, trading, and more.
home.step4Desc: The agent uses real tools to deliver actionable, concrete results - not just text.
home.roadmapDesc: We're building the future of accessible AI agents. Here's what we've shipped and what's coming next.
home.roadmapItem1Desc: Share, discover, and install community-built macros and agent configurations with one click.
home.roadmapItem2Desc: Let agents work in the background on complex research and multi-step workflows. Get notified when results are ready.
home.roadmapItem3Desc: Run macros on a schedule or with triggers - price tracking, data collection, and recurring workflows on autopilot.
home.roadmapItem4Desc: Agents that remember past conversations and learn from your documents for smarter, context-aware responses.
home.roadmapItem5Desc: Run lightweight AI models directly in your browser - fully private, no API key required for basic tasks.
home.providersTitle: Use Any AI Model You Want
home.providersDesc: 17+ AI providers, one platform. Bring your own API key - no vendor lock-in, no middleman fees. Your keys never leave your browser.
home.providersCta: Configure your API keys in settings
home.noApiKeyStorage: We never store your API keys
home.privacyDesc: izan.io is fully open source - built for trust and transparency. Your API keys live only in your browser's IndexedDB. Your conversations stay local. We grow with our community, not at their expense.

chat.startTyping: Type a message to start the conversation
chat.startNewChat: Start a new conversation to chat with this agent.
chat.selectProviderFirst: Select a provider and model first...
chat.selectProviderHint: Select a provider and model from the top right to send messages
chat.systemPrompt: You are a helpful AI assistant. Respond in English. Be kind and informative to the user.
chat.responseError: [Error: Something went wrong while generating the response]
chat.authError: Your API key is invalid or expired. Please check your key in Settings.
chat.networkError: Could not connect to the API provider. Check your internet connection and try again.
chat.rateLimitError: Rate limit exceeded. Please wait a moment and try again, or check your plan limits.
chat.serverError: The API provider is experiencing issues. Please try again later.
chat.toolNotFound: Error: Tool not found: {{name}}. Available tools: {{available}}
chat.maxAgentDepth: Maximum agent depth exceeded. No further agent calls can be made.
chat.llmNotConfigured: LLM not configured. Select a provider and model from Settings.
chat.deleteChatConfirm: This chat and all its messages will be permanently deleted.
chat.deepTaskTooltip: Agent works autonomously. You'll be notified when it's done.
chat.startFirstChat: Start your first conversation with this agent

provider.selectDesc: Choose an AI provider and enter your API key. Keys are stored only in your browser.

localHint.ollama: Runs locally on your machine. No API key needed, no data leaves your device.

freeTierHint.google: 250 requests/day, no credit card required. aistudio.google.com
freeTierHint.groq: Thousands of tokens/min, daily limit. No credit card required.
freeTierHint.cohere: Trial API key free. Rate limited, paid for commercial use.
freeTierHint.togetherai: DeepSeek-R1-Distill-Llama-70B-free model free. $25 credits for new users.
freeTierHint.ollama: Fully free, local use, no API key needed.

agents.title: AI Agents
agents.description: Agents integrated with MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers. Each agent provides access to different tools and automates tasks.
agents.createPlain: A blank agent will be created. You can customize it later.
agents.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this agent?
agents.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset this agent to its default settings?
agents.name: Name
agents.basePromptPlaceholder: Prompt defining the agent's base behavior...
agents.modelParamsDesc: Control how this agent generates responses. Leave empty to use defaults.
agents.temperatureDesc: Higher values (e.g. 1.0) make output more creative and varied. Lower values (e.g. 0.2) make it more focused and deterministic. Range: 0–2.
agents.maxTokensDesc: Maximum length of the response. Higher values allow longer answers but cost more. Leave empty for provider default.
agents.topPDesc: Nucleus sampling: only considers tokens in the top P probability mass. Lower = more focused. Range: 0–1.
agents.maxIterationsDesc: Maximum LLM rounds per message. Each round is one LLM call - tool calls, text responses, and continuation nudges all count. Range: 1–100.

general.name: General Assistant
general.description: General purpose AI assistant. Helps with any topic.
general.detailedDescription: Your everyday AI companion. The General Assistant handles a wide range of tasks - from quick calculations and time checks to generating secure passwords and unique identifiers. Think of it as your smart utility belt: always ready, always helpful, no setup required.
general.whatItDoes: The General Assistant comes with built-in utility tools that let it go beyond simple conversation. It can tell you the current time, perform mathematical calculations, generate cryptographically secure passwords, create UUIDs, and produce random numbers. It's the perfect starting point for anyone new to izan.io.
general.feature1: Instant time and date lookups across timezones
general.feature2: Mathematical calculations from simple arithmetic to complex expressions
general.feature3: Secure password generation with customizable length and complexity
general.feature4: UUID and random number generation for development and testing
general.howToUse: Just start chatting naturally. Ask a question, request a calculation, or ask for a password - the assistant automatically picks the right tool. No configuration needed.
general.proTip: You can combine multiple requests in one message. For example: "Generate a UUID, create a 20-character password, and calculate 15% of 2499."
general.usageExample3: Generate a secure 24-character password with symbols
general.usageExample4: Create 5 UUIDs for my database records

web-fetch.name: Web Fetch
web-fetch.description: Web fetch assistant. Navigate to any web page and read its content.
web-fetch.detailedDescription: Your go-to agent for reading web pages. The Web Fetch agent opens a real browser tab via the Chrome extension, navigates to any URL, and returns the full accessibility tree of the page. Perfect for reading articles, checking documentation, or extracting information from any website.
web-fetch.whatItDoes: The Web Fetch agent uses the Chrome extension to open a browser tab, navigate to any URL, wait for the page to fully load, and return the complete accessibility tree. This gives you structured, readable content from any web page without CORS restrictions.
web-fetch.feature1: Fetch any web page - no CORS restrictions
web-fetch.feature2: Full accessibility tree with semantic structure
web-fetch.feature3: Real browser rendering via Chrome extension
web-fetch.feature4: No API key required - uses your browser
web-fetch.howToUse: Provide a URL and the agent will open it in a browser tab, wait for it to load, and return the page content as a structured accessibility tree. You can ask questions about the content or request specific pages.
web-fetch.proTip: The agent opens real browser tabs - make sure the Chrome extension is installed and active for this agent to work.
web-fetch.usageExample2: What does the React documentation say about hooks?
web-fetch.usageExample3: Read the content of this page: https://news.ycombinator.com
web-fetch.usageExample4: Summarize the article at this URL
web-fetch.usageExample5: What information is on this page?

x-manager.name: X Manager
x-manager.description: Automate X/Twitter: post, like, retweet, follow, search, scrape profiles, and more. No Twitter API key needed.
x-manager.detailedDescription: Your X (formerly Twitter) automation assistant. This agent controls X.com directly through the browser using the izan.io Chrome extension - no Twitter API keys or developer accounts required. It can post tweets, like and retweet posts, follow and unfollow users, search tweets, scrape profiles and timelines, check trending topics, send DMs, manage bookmarks, and monitor notifications. Everything runs in your browser session, so your credentials stay local and private.
x-manager.whatItDoes: The X Manager agent uses 21 pre-built browser automation macros to interact with X.com through the Chrome extension. It navigates to the right pages, waits for content to load, and uses X.com's stable data-testid selectors to perform actions and extract data. Bulk tools run in parallel browser tabs for speed. No API keys, no rate limit tokens, no developer account needed - it works through the browser just like you would.
x-manager.mcps: Browser Extension (X/Twitter automation macros - 21 tools, including 6 parallel bulk tools)
x-manager.feature1: Post tweets (with 280-char validation), reply, like, retweet, and bookmark - all through browser automation, no Twitter API key required
x-manager.feature2: Parallel bulk operations: scrape multiple profiles, search multiple queries, like/retweet/follow many items simultaneously in parallel browser tabs
x-manager.feature3: Search tweets with advanced operators, scrape user profiles (bio, followers, location), extract timelines with engagement metrics, monitor trending topics
x-manager.feature4: Send direct messages, check notifications, manage bookmarks, follow/unfollow users - runs entirely in your browser via the Chrome extension
x-manager.howToUse: Install the izan.io Chrome extension, then select the X Manager agent and start chatting. Ask it to post a tweet, search for topics, check trending, scrape a profile, or perform any X/Twitter action. The agent opens X.com in a browser tab, performs the action, and returns the results. You must be logged into X.com in your browser.
x-manager.proTip: For bulk operations, just ask naturally: 'Compare the profiles of @openai, @anthropic, and @google' - the agent will use bulk_scrape_profiles to fetch all three in parallel. Use X search operators like from:user, min_faves:100, or lang:en for precise results.
x-manager.usageExample1: Post a tweet about our latest product launch
x-manager.usageExample3: Search for 'AI agents', 'open source LLM' and 'browser automation' in parallel
x-manager.usageExample4: What's trending on X right now?
x-manager.usageExample5: Like and retweet these tweets: url1, url2, url3

play-store.name: Play Store
play-store.description: Search and analyze apps on Google Play Store using browser automation.
play-store.detailedDescription: Your Play Store research assistant. This agent uses browser automation macros to search the Google Play Store and fetch detailed app information. It can find apps by name, category, or description and retrieve download counts, ratings, and app details.
play-store.whatItDoes: The Play Store agent uses pre-built browser automation macros via the Chrome extension to navigate Google Play Store pages. It can search for apps and scrape detailed information including descriptions, download stats, ratings, and more.
play-store.feature1: Search apps by name, category, or description
play-store.feature2: Fetch detailed app info including ratings and downloads
play-store.feature3: Automated browsing via Chrome extension macros
play-store.feature4: No API key required - uses browser automation
play-store.howToUse: Ask about any app or search the Play Store. The agent will use browser automation to navigate to Google Play Store, search for apps, and extract detailed information. Results include app names, descriptions, download counts, and ratings.
play-store.proTip: Make sure the Chrome extension is installed. You can search by app name or browse by category. For detailed info, provide the app package ID (e.g. com.example.app).
play-store.usageExample1: Search for weather apps on Play Store
play-store.usageExample2: Get details about the WhatsApp app
play-store.usageExample4: What are the best note-taking apps?
play-store.usageExample5: Look up com.spotify.music on Play Store

linkedin-manager.name: LinkedIn Manager
linkedin-manager.description: Automate LinkedIn: search people, scrape profiles, send connections, message contacts, and search jobs. No LinkedIn API needed.
linkedin-manager.detailedDescription: Your LinkedIn automation assistant. This agent controls LinkedIn directly through the browser using the izan.io Chrome extension - no LinkedIn API keys or developer accounts required. It can search for people, scrape detailed profiles, send connection requests with personalized notes, message existing connections, search for jobs, and scrape job details. Bulk operations run in parallel browser tabs for speed.
linkedin-manager.whatItDoes: The LinkedIn Manager agent uses 8 pre-built browser automation macros to interact with LinkedIn through the Chrome extension. It navigates to the right pages, waits for content to load, and extracts structured data from profiles, job listings, and search results. Bulk tools run in parallel browser tabs. No API keys needed - it works through the browser just like you would.
linkedin-manager.mcps: Browser Extension (LinkedIn automation macros - 8 tools, including 2 parallel bulk tools)
linkedin-manager.feature1: Search people by name, title, or company and extract detailed profile data including headline, experience, and connections
linkedin-manager.feature2: Send connection requests with optional personalized notes, and message existing connections directly
linkedin-manager.feature3: Search and scrape job listings with full descriptions, requirements, and company info
linkedin-manager.feature4: Parallel bulk operations: scrape multiple profiles or send connection requests simultaneously in parallel browser tabs
linkedin-manager.howToUse: Install the izan.io Chrome extension, then select the LinkedIn Manager agent and start chatting. Ask it to search for people, scrape a profile, send a connection request, or find jobs. You must be logged into LinkedIn in your browser.
linkedin-manager.proTip: For bulk profile scraping, pass comma-separated LinkedIn profile URLs. The agent will scrape all profiles in parallel. Use specific search queries like job titles or company names for better results.
linkedin-manager.usageExample1: Search for 'software engineer' people on LinkedIn
linkedin-manager.usageExample3: Search for 'product manager' jobs in San Francisco
linkedin-manager.usageExample4: Send a connection request to this profile with a note
linkedin-manager.usageExample5: Scrape these 5 LinkedIn profiles in parallel

maps-scout.name: Maps Scout
maps-scout.description: Automate Google Maps: search places, scrape business details, read reviews, get directions, and export data.
maps-scout.detailedDescription: Your Google Maps research assistant. This agent controls Google Maps directly through the browser using the izan.io Chrome extension. It can search for businesses, scrape detailed place information (address, phone, website, hours, ratings), read and extract reviews, get directions between locations, and export search results as structured data. Perfect for local business research, competitor analysis, and lead generation.
maps-scout.whatItDoes: The Maps Scout agent uses 7 pre-built browser automation macros to interact with Google Maps through the Chrome extension. It navigates to search results, scrolls through the results feed, and extracts structured data from place pages. Bulk tools run in parallel browser tabs for speed.
maps-scout.mcps: Browser Extension (Google Maps automation macros - 7 tools, including 2 parallel bulk tools)
maps-scout.feature1: Search for any business or place type and extract results with names, ratings, addresses, and URLs
maps-scout.feature2: Scrape detailed place info: address, phone, website, hours, rating, review count, and price level
maps-scout.feature3: Extract reviews with author names, ratings, text, and dates - great for sentiment analysis
maps-scout.feature4: Get directions between locations and export search results as structured data for analysis
maps-scout.howToUse: Install the izan.io Chrome extension, then select the Maps Scout agent and start chatting. Ask it to search for businesses, get details about a place, read reviews, or get directions. The agent opens Google Maps in a browser tab and extracts the data.
maps-scout.proTip: Use specific search queries like 'Italian restaurants in downtown Chicago' for targeted results. For bulk operations, search multiple queries in parallel or scrape multiple place URLs at once.
maps-scout.usageExample1: Find coffee shops near Times Square, New York
maps-scout.usageExample2: Get details and reviews for this Google Maps place
maps-scout.usageExample3: Search for dentists, plumbers, and electricians in Austin in parallel
maps-scout.usageExample4: Get directions from LAX to Santa Monica
maps-scout.usageExample5: Export all restaurants in this area with phone numbers and websites

discord-manager.name: Discord Manager
discord-manager.description: Automate Discord: send messages, scrape channels, search messages, view members, and manage servers.
discord-manager.detailedDescription: Your Discord automation assistant. This agent controls Discord directly through the browser using the izan.io Chrome extension. It can send messages to channels, scrape recent messages from channels, search messages across a server, view member lists, delete your own messages, and get server info. Bulk operations let you send messages to multiple channels simultaneously.
discord-manager.whatItDoes: The Discord Manager agent uses 7 pre-built browser automation macros to interact with Discord through the Chrome extension. It navigates to channels, extracts messages and member data, and can perform actions like sending messages and deleting your own messages. For certain operations it uses Discord's REST API via code steps for reliability.
discord-manager.mcps: Browser Extension (Discord automation macros - 7 tools, including 1 parallel bulk tool)
discord-manager.feature1: Send messages to any channel and scrape recent messages with author names, content, and timestamps
discord-manager.feature2: Search messages across a server using Discord's search syntax (from:user, has:link, before:date)
discord-manager.feature3: View server member lists with usernames and roles, and get server info including channel lists
discord-manager.feature4: Delete your own recent messages in a channel and send messages to multiple channels in parallel
discord-manager.howToUse: Install the izan.io Chrome extension, then select the Discord Manager agent and start chatting. Provide Discord channel URLs (format: discord.com/channels/serverId/channelId) and ask it to send messages, scrape channels, or search. You must be logged into Discord in your browser.
discord-manager.proTip: Discord channel URLs follow the format discord.com/channels/{serverId}/{channelId}. You can copy these directly from your browser. For message deletion, only your own messages can be deleted.
discord-manager.usageExample1: Scrape the last 20 messages from this Discord channel
discord-manager.usageExample3: Search for messages containing 'meeting' in this server
discord-manager.usageExample4: Show me the member list of this server
discord-manager.usageExample5: Delete my last 5 messages in this channel

reddit-manager.name: Reddit Manager
reddit-manager.description: Automate Reddit: search posts, scrape subreddits, read comments, upvote, post comments, and analyze users.
reddit-manager.detailedDescription: Your Reddit automation assistant. This agent controls Reddit directly through the browser using the izan.io Chrome extension. It uses old.reddit.com for stable, reliable automation. It can search posts across Reddit, scrape subreddit feeds, read full posts with comments, upvote posts, post comments, and analyze user profiles. Bulk operations run in parallel for efficiency.
reddit-manager.whatItDoes: The Reddit Manager agent uses 9 pre-built browser automation macros to interact with Reddit through the Chrome extension. It uses old.reddit.com which has stable CSS selectors (data-* attributes, .thing elements) that don't change. Bulk tools run in parallel browser tabs for speed.
reddit-manager.mcps: Browser Extension (Reddit automation macros - 9 tools, including 3 parallel bulk tools)
reddit-manager.feature1: Search posts across Reddit with sorting options (relevance, hot, top, new) and extract titles, scores, authors, and URLs
reddit-manager.feature2: Scrape subreddit feeds with post details, flairs, and stickied status - and read full posts with top comments
reddit-manager.feature3: Upvote posts and post comments with Reddit markdown support - requires being logged into Reddit
reddit-manager.feature4: Parallel bulk operations: scrape multiple subreddits, search multiple queries, or upvote multiple posts simultaneously
reddit-manager.howToUse: Install the izan.io Chrome extension, then select the Reddit Manager agent and start chatting. Ask it to search for posts, scrape a subreddit, read comments, or analyze a user. You must be logged into Reddit in your browser for actions like upvoting and commenting.
reddit-manager.proTip: All tools use old.reddit.com for reliability. For bulk operations, just list multiple subreddits or queries separated by commas. Use sorting options like 'top' or 'new' for different perspectives on subreddit content.
reddit-manager.usageExample2: Scrape the top posts from r/machinelearning
reddit-manager.usageExample3: Read this Reddit post and its top comments
reddit-manager.usageExample4: Compare posts from r/python, r/javascript, and r/rust
reddit-manager.usageExample5: What has user 'spez' been posting recently?

jira-manager.name: Jira Manager
jira-manager.description: Automate Jira: search issues with JQL, create and update tickets, manage sprints, transition statuses, and add comments.
jira-manager.detailedDescription: Your Jira automation assistant. This agent interacts with Jira directly through the browser using the izan.io Chrome extension. It uses Jira's REST API v3 via same-origin requests, leveraging your existing browser session for authentication. Search issues with JQL, create and update tickets, transition statuses, manage sprints, and perform bulk updates across multiple issues in parallel.
jira-manager.whatItDoes: The Jira Manager agent uses 10 pre-built browser automation macros to interact with Jira through the Chrome extension. It calls Jira's REST API v3 endpoints directly from the browser page context, using your session cookies for authentication. Bulk operations run in parallel browser tabs.
jira-manager.mcps: Browser Extension (Jira automation macros - 10 tools, including 1 parallel bulk tool)
jira-manager.feature1: Search issues using JQL (Jira Query Language) with full support for project, status, assignee, and date filters
jira-manager.feature2: Create new issues with project, type, summary, description, and priority - and update existing issue fields
jira-manager.feature3: Transition issues between statuses (To Do, In Progress, Done) and assign issues to team members
jira-manager.feature4: View boards and sprint issues, add comments, and bulk update multiple issues in parallel
jira-manager.howToUse: Install the izan.io Chrome extension, then select the Jira Manager agent and start chatting. Provide your Jira instance URL (e.g. company.atlassian.net) and you must be logged into Jira in your browser.
jira-manager.proTip: Use JQL syntax for powerful searches: 'project = PROJ AND status = "In Progress" AND assignee = currentUser()'. The agent can translate natural language to JQL for you.
jira-manager.usageExample1: Search for all open bugs in project PROJ
jira-manager.usageExample2: Create a new task: 'Update API documentation'
jira-manager.usageExample4: Show me the current sprint issues
jira-manager.usageExample5: Add a comment to PROJ-456 saying 'Fixed in latest build'

slack-manager.name: Slack Manager
slack-manager.description: Automate Slack: send messages, search conversations, list channels and members, scrape channel history, and set status.
slack-manager.detailedDescription: Your Slack automation assistant. This agent interacts with Slack directly through the browser using the izan.io Chrome extension. It extracts your session token from localStorage and uses Slack's internal API endpoints for reliable automation. Send messages, search across conversations, list channels and members, scrape channel history, and manage your status.
slack-manager.whatItDoes: The Slack Manager agent uses 9 pre-built browser automation macros to interact with Slack through the Chrome extension. It extracts the xoxc token from localStorage for API authentication. Bulk operations send messages or search queries in parallel.
slack-manager.mcps: Browser Extension (Slack automation macros - 9 tools, including 2 parallel bulk tools)
slack-manager.feature1: Send messages to any channel and search across all workspace conversations using Slack's search syntax
slack-manager.feature2: List all channels with member counts, topics, and purposes - and view workspace members with roles
slack-manager.feature3: Scrape recent channel history with messages, authors, timestamps, and reactions
slack-manager.feature4: Set your Slack status with emoji, delete your own messages, and send to multiple channels in parallel
slack-manager.howToUse: Install the izan.io Chrome extension, then select the Slack Manager agent and start chatting. You must be logged into your Slack workspace at app.slack.com in your browser.
slack-manager.proTip: Use Slack search syntax for powerful queries: 'from:@user in:#channel has:link before:2025-01-01'. Channel names should be without the # prefix.
slack-manager.usageExample2: Search for messages about 'deployment' in the last week
slack-manager.usageExample3: List all channels in the workspace
slack-manager.usageExample4: Show me the recent messages in #general
slack-manager.usageExample5: Set my status to 'In a meeting' with :calendar: emoji

github-manager.name: GitHub Manager
github-manager.description: Automate GitHub: search repos, scrape profiles, list issues and PRs, create issues, star repos, and browse trending.
github-manager.detailedDescription: Your GitHub automation assistant. This agent interacts with GitHub directly through the browser using the izan.io Chrome extension. It combines DOM extraction for read operations with GitHub's REST API for write operations. Search repositories, scrape profiles and repo details, list issues and pull requests, star repos, and browse trending projects.
github-manager.whatItDoes: The GitHub Manager agent uses 10 pre-built browser automation macros to interact with GitHub through the Chrome extension. Most read operations use DOM extraction from GitHub pages, while write operations use the REST API. Bulk operations run in parallel browser tabs.
github-manager.mcps: Browser Extension (GitHub automation macros - 10 tools, including 2 parallel bulk tools)
github-manager.feature1: Search repositories by keywords with sorting options and scrape detailed repo info including stars, forks, and README
github-manager.feature2: Scrape user profiles with bio, stats, pinned repos, and contribution data
github-manager.feature3: List issues and pull requests for any repo, and create new issues with markdown support
github-manager.feature4: Star repos, browse trending projects by language and time range, and bulk scrape or star multiple repos in parallel
github-manager.howToUse: Install the izan.io Chrome extension, then select the GitHub Manager agent and start chatting. For read operations like searching and scraping, no login is required. For actions like starring repos or creating issues, you must be logged into GitHub.
github-manager.proTip: Most read operations work without being logged in. Provide repo URLs directly for faster scraping. For trending, you can filter by language (python, rust, etc.) and time range (daily, weekly, monthly).
github-manager.usageExample1: Search GitHub for the best React component libraries
github-manager.usageExample4: Show me today's trending Python repos
github-manager.usageExample5: Star these 3 repos for me: repo1, repo2, repo3

notion-manager.name: Notion Manager
notion-manager.description: Automate Notion: search pages, read content, create and update pages, scrape databases, and export structured data.
notion-manager.detailedDescription: Your Notion automation assistant. This agent interacts with Notion directly through the browser using the izan.io Chrome extension. It uses Notion's internal API (/api/v3/) via same-origin requests, leveraging your session cookie (token_v2) for authentication. Search pages, read content, create and update pages, scrape databases, and export structured data.
notion-manager.whatItDoes: The Notion Manager agent uses 8 pre-built browser automation macros to interact with Notion through the Chrome extension. It calls Notion's internal API endpoints and extracts content from the DOM. Bulk search operations run in parallel.
notion-manager.mcps: Browser Extension (Notion automation macros - 8 tools, including 1 parallel bulk tool)
notion-manager.feature1: Search across your entire Notion workspace for pages and databases by keyword
notion-manager.feature2: Read page content including blocks, properties, and structured data from any page
notion-manager.feature3: Create new pages with titles and content, and update existing page titles or append text
notion-manager.feature4: Scrape and export Notion databases as structured JSON data with all visible properties
notion-manager.howToUse: Install the izan.io Chrome extension, then select the Notion Manager agent and start chatting. You must be logged into your Notion workspace at notion.so in your browser.
notion-manager.proTip: Notion page URLs contain the page ID at the end (32 hex characters). For databases, share the database view URL. The export tool scrolls to collect all visible rows.
notion-manager.usageExample2: Read the contents of this Notion page
notion-manager.usageExample3: Create a new page titled 'Meeting Notes - Feb 2025'
notion-manager.usageExample4: Scrape all rows from my tasks database
notion-manager.usageExample5: List my recent pages from the sidebar

whatsapp-manager.name: WhatsApp Manager
whatsapp-manager.description: Automate WhatsApp Web: send messages, search chats, scrape conversations, list contacts, and send to phone numbers.
whatsapp-manager.detailedDescription: Your WhatsApp Web automation assistant. This agent interacts with WhatsApp Web directly through the browser using the izan.io Chrome extension. It uses DOM selectors to navigate the WhatsApp Web interface - searching contacts, opening chats, sending messages, and extracting conversation data. Bulk send operations deliver messages to multiple contacts in parallel.
whatsapp-manager.whatItDoes: The WhatsApp Manager agent uses 7 pre-built browser automation macros to interact with WhatsApp Web through the Chrome extension. It navigates the web.whatsapp.com interface using DOM selectors for search, message input, and data extraction.
whatsapp-manager.mcps: Browser Extension (WhatsApp automation macros - 7 tools, including 1 parallel bulk tool)
whatsapp-manager.feature1: Send messages to any contact or group by name, and send directly to phone numbers via wa.me links
whatsapp-manager.feature2: Search conversations by keyword and extract matching chat previews with contact names and timestamps
whatsapp-manager.feature3: Scrape recent messages from any chat with sender names, message text, and timestamps
whatsapp-manager.feature4: List all contacts and groups from the sidebar, and export entire chat histories as structured data
whatsapp-manager.howToUse: Install the izan.io Chrome extension, then select the WhatsApp Manager agent and start chatting. You must be logged into WhatsApp Web at web.whatsapp.com (phone must be connected).
whatsapp-manager.proTip: For sending to phone numbers, include the country code without + or spaces (e.g. 14155552671). Be cautious with bulk sends - WhatsApp may rate-limit accounts that send too many messages.
whatsapp-manager.usageExample1: Send 'Hey, are we still meeting today?' to John
whatsapp-manager.usageExample2: Search my chats for messages about 'dinner'
whatsapp-manager.usageExample3: Scrape the last 20 messages from the Family Group

trello-manager.name: Trello Manager
trello-manager.description: Automate Trello: list boards, scrape cards, create and update cards, move between lists, add comments, and search.
trello-manager.detailedDescription: Your Trello automation assistant. This agent interacts with Trello directly through the browser using the izan.io Chrome extension. It uses Trello's REST API via same-origin requests, leveraging your session cookies for authentication. List boards, scrape all cards from a board, create and update cards, move cards between lists, add comments, and search across your workspace.
trello-manager.whatItDoes: The Trello Manager agent uses 9 pre-built browser automation macros to interact with Trello through the Chrome extension. It calls Trello's REST API endpoints directly from the browser. Bulk create and move operations run in parallel browser tabs.
trello-manager.mcps: Browser Extension (Trello automation macros - 9 tools, including 2 parallel bulk tools)
trello-manager.feature1: List all your boards and scrape complete board data with lists, cards, labels, and due dates
trello-manager.feature2: Create new cards with titles, descriptions, and due dates in any list
trello-manager.feature3: Update card details, move cards between lists, and add comments to cards
trello-manager.feature4: Search across all boards for cards and boards, and bulk create or move multiple cards in parallel
trello-manager.howToUse: Install the izan.io Chrome extension, then select the Trello Manager agent and start chatting. You must be logged into Trello at trello.com in your browser. Start by listing your boards to get board and list IDs.
trello-manager.proTip: Start with 'List my boards' then 'Scrape board [URL]' to get list IDs. You'll need list IDs for creating and moving cards. Card IDs are returned when scraping a board.
trello-manager.usageExample2: Scrape all cards from this board
trello-manager.usageExample3: Create a card 'Review PR #123' in the To Do list
trello-manager.usageExample4: Move these 3 cards to the Done list

telegram-manager.name: Telegram Manager
telegram-manager.description: Automate Telegram Web: search chats, scrape messages, send messages, manage contacts, and export conversations.
telegram-manager.detailedDescription: Your Telegram automation assistant. This agent controls Telegram Web directly through the browser using the izan.io Chrome extension. It can search for chats and channels, read messages from conversations, send messages, view your contacts, scrape channel info, and export chat history. Bulk operations let you send messages to multiple chats simultaneously.
telegram-manager.whatItDoes: The Telegram Manager agent uses 7 pre-built browser automation macros to interact with Telegram Web (web.telegram.org/k/) through the Chrome extension. It navigates the Telegram interface using DOM selectors for search, message input, and data extraction.
telegram-manager.mcps: Browser Extension (Telegram automation macros - 7 tools, including 1 parallel bulk tool)
telegram-manager.feature1: Search for chats, channels, and contacts by name and scrape recent messages with author names and timestamps
telegram-manager.feature2: Send messages to any chat or channel with text input via the compose box
telegram-manager.feature3: Scrape channel information including subscriber counts, descriptions, and recent posts
telegram-manager.feature4: Export chat history and send messages to multiple chats in parallel with bulk operations
telegram-manager.howToUse: Install the izan.io Chrome extension, then select the Telegram Manager agent and start chatting. You must be logged into Telegram Web at web.telegram.org in your browser.
telegram-manager.proTip: You can search for chats by name or username. For bulk sending, provide comma-separated chat names. The agent works with both private chats and public channels.
telegram-manager.usageExample2: Read the last 20 messages from my chat with John
telegram-manager.usageExample3: Send 'Meeting at 3pm' to the team group
telegram-manager.usageExample4: Export my chat history with Alice
telegram-manager.usageExample5: Scrape the latest posts from this Telegram channel

sheets-agent.name: Google Sheets Agent
sheets-agent.description: Automate Google Sheets: open spreadsheets, read and write cells, create new sheets, search Drive, and export CSV.
sheets-agent.detailedDescription: Your Google Sheets automation assistant. This agent interacts with Google Sheets directly through the browser using the izan.io Chrome extension. It can open spreadsheets, read cell ranges, write values to cells, create new spreadsheets, search Google Drive for sheets, and export data as CSV. Bulk read lets you pull data from multiple spreadsheets simultaneously.
sheets-agent.whatItDoes: The Google Sheets Agent uses 7 pre-built browser automation macros to interact with Google Sheets through the Chrome extension. It navigates the Sheets UI, reads grid data from the DOM, and writes cells using the name box and formula bar.
sheets-agent.mcps: Browser Extension (Google Sheets automation macros - 7 tools, including 1 parallel bulk tool)
sheets-agent.feature1: Open spreadsheets and get sheet tabs, dimensions, and structure at a glance
sheets-agent.feature2: Read cell ranges (e.g. A1:C10) and write values to specific cells using standard cell notation
sheets-agent.feature3: Create new spreadsheets and search Google Drive for existing ones by name
sheets-agent.feature4: Export spreadsheets as CSV and read from multiple spreadsheets in parallel
sheets-agent.howToUse: Install the izan.io Chrome extension, then select the Google Sheets Agent and start chatting. You must be logged into your Google account in your browser. Provide spreadsheet URLs for read/write operations.
sheets-agent.proTip: Use standard cell notation like A1, B2:D10 for ranges. Start with 'Open [URL]' to see the sheet structure, then read or write specific ranges. For bulk reads, provide comma-separated spreadsheet URLs.
sheets-agent.usageExample1: Open this spreadsheet and show me the sheet tabs
sheets-agent.usageExample2: Read cells A1 to D20 from this spreadsheet
sheets-agent.usageExample4: Create a new spreadsheet called 'Q1 Report'

youtube-agent.name: YouTube Agent
youtube-agent.description: Automate YouTube: search videos, scrape video details, channels, comments, playlists, and bulk operations.
youtube-agent.detailedDescription: Your YouTube automation assistant. This agent interacts with YouTube directly through the browser using the izan.io Chrome extension. It can search for videos, scrape detailed video information (title, views, likes, description), browse channels, read comments, and explore playlists. Bulk operations run searches and video scrapes in parallel.
youtube-agent.whatItDoes: The YouTube Agent uses 7 pre-built browser automation macros to interact with YouTube through the Chrome extension. It navigates YouTube pages, extracts data from the DOM including video metadata, channel info, and comments.
youtube-agent.mcps: Browser Extension (YouTube automation macros - 7 tools, including 2 parallel bulk tools)
youtube-agent.feature1: Search for videos by query and get results with titles, channels, view counts, and durations
youtube-agent.feature2: Scrape detailed video info including title, description, views, likes, channel, and upload date
youtube-agent.feature3: Browse channels to see subscriber counts, video lists, and scrape playlist contents
youtube-agent.feature4: Read video comments and run bulk searches or video scrapes in parallel
youtube-agent.howToUse: Install the izan.io Chrome extension, then select the YouTube Agent and start chatting. No login is required for public content. Provide video or channel URLs for scraping specific pages.
youtube-agent.proTip: For bulk operations, provide comma-separated queries or video URLs. Comments require scrolling, so the agent will scroll down to load them. Public content doesn't require login.
youtube-agent.usageExample2: Scrape the details of this YouTube video
youtube-agent.usageExample3: Show me the latest videos from this channel
youtube-agent.usageExample4: Read the top comments on this video
youtube-agent.usageExample5: List all videos in this playlist

spotify-manager.name: Spotify Manager
spotify-manager.description: Automate Spotify: search music, scrape playlists, artists, albums, play tracks, and create playlists.
spotify-manager.detailedDescription: Your Spotify automation assistant. This agent interacts with Spotify directly through the browser using the izan.io Chrome extension. It can search for songs, albums, and artists, scrape playlist track lists, view artist info and top tracks, browse album contents, play tracks, and create new playlists. Bulk search runs multiple queries in parallel.
spotify-manager.whatItDoes: The Spotify Manager agent uses 7 pre-built browser automation macros to interact with Spotify Web Player (open.spotify.com) through the Chrome extension. It navigates the Spotify interface, extracts track and artist data, and can control playback.
spotify-manager.mcps: Browser Extension (Spotify automation macros - 7 tools, including 1 parallel bulk tool)
spotify-manager.feature1: Search for songs, albums, and artists with detailed results including track names and artist info
spotify-manager.feature2: Scrape complete playlist track lists with song titles, artists, and durations
spotify-manager.feature3: View artist profiles with monthly listeners, top tracks, and popular releases
spotify-manager.feature4: Play tracks directly, create new playlists, and run bulk searches in parallel
spotify-manager.howToUse: Install the izan.io Chrome extension, then select the Spotify Manager agent and start chatting. You must be logged into Spotify at open.spotify.com in your browser. A Spotify account (free or premium) is required.
spotify-manager.proTip: Provide Spotify URLs for specific playlists, artists, or albums. For search, just describe what you're looking for. Playback control requires an active Spotify session.
spotify-manager.usageExample2: Show me all tracks in this playlist
spotify-manager.usageExample3: What are the top tracks by this artist?
spotify-manager.usageExample4: List all songs on this album
spotify-manager.usageExample5: Create a new playlist called 'Workout Mix'

airtable-agent.name: Airtable Agent
airtable-agent.description: Automate Airtable: list bases, scrape tables, create and update records, search, and manage views.
airtable-agent.detailedDescription: Your Airtable automation assistant. This agent interacts with Airtable directly through the browser using the izan.io Chrome extension. It can list your bases, scrape table data from grid views, create and update records, search for specific entries, and browse table views. Bulk operations create records across multiple tables simultaneously.
airtable-agent.whatItDoes: The Airtable Agent uses 7 pre-built browser automation macros to interact with Airtable through the Chrome extension. It navigates the Airtable web interface, reads grid data from the DOM, and creates/updates records by interacting with cell inputs.
airtable-agent.mcps: Browser Extension (Airtable automation macros - 7 tools, including 1 parallel bulk tool)
airtable-agent.feature1: List all your bases from the dashboard and scrape complete table data with column headers and rows
airtable-agent.feature2: Create new records by filling in field values through the grid interface
airtable-agent.feature3: Update existing records and search for specific entries within a table
airtable-agent.feature4: Browse available views for a table and bulk create records across multiple tables in parallel
airtable-agent.howToUse: Install the izan.io Chrome extension, then select the Airtable Agent and start chatting. You must be logged into Airtable at airtable.com in your browser. Start by listing your bases to get base and table URLs.
airtable-agent.proTip: Start with 'List my bases' to see available bases. Provide table URLs for scraping or record operations. Field values for create/update should be provided as field:value pairs.
airtable-agent.usageExample2: Scrape all records from this table
airtable-agent.usageExample3: Create a new record with Name='John' and Email='john@example.com'
airtable-agent.usageExample4: Search for records containing 'urgent' in this table
airtable-agent.usageExample5: Show me all views available for this table

figma-agent.name: Figma Agent
figma-agent.description: Automate Figma: list files, scrape designs, read and add comments, search projects, and browse components.
figma-agent.detailedDescription: Your Figma automation assistant. This agent interacts with Figma directly through the browser using the izan.io Chrome extension. It can list your recent files, scrape file details and page structures, read and add comments, search for files and projects, and browse component libraries. Bulk scrape lets you pull info from multiple files simultaneously.
figma-agent.whatItDoes: The Figma Agent uses 7 pre-built browser automation macros to interact with Figma through the Chrome extension. It navigates the Figma web interface, extracts file metadata, reads comments, and browses the layers and assets panels.
figma-agent.mcps: Browser Extension (Figma automation macros - 7 tools, including 1 parallel bulk tool)
figma-agent.feature1: List recent files from your Figma dashboard with names, thumbnails, and last modified dates
figma-agent.feature2: Scrape file details including page names, frame counts, and component structure
figma-agent.feature3: Read comments with author names, content, and timestamps, and add new comments to files
figma-agent.feature4: Search for files and projects by name, browse component libraries, and bulk scrape multiple files
figma-agent.howToUse: Install the izan.io Chrome extension, then select the Figma Agent and start chatting. You must be logged into Figma at figma.com in your browser. Provide file URLs for scraping specific designs.
figma-agent.proTip: Start with 'List my recent files' to see your workspace. For comments, the agent reads the comments panel. Component browsing works through the assets panel in the editor.
figma-agent.usageExample2: Scrape the pages and frames from this Figma file
figma-agent.usageExample3: Show me all comments on this design file
figma-agent.usageExample4: Add a comment 'Please review this section' to this file
figma-agent.usageExample5: List all components in this Figma file

agents.extensionMCPsWarning: Install the browser extension to use these macros.
agents.linkedAgentsDesc: This agent can ask questions to linked agents.
agents.macrosDesc: Automation macros (browser workflows) assigned to this agent
agents.noMacros: No macros available. Record macros from the extension side panel.
agents.noAvailableMCPs: No MCP servers to add. Add new MCPs from settings.
agents.noAvailableAgents: No other agents available to link.
agents.importError: Failed to import agent. Please check the file format.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: Track your token usage and costs across models and agents.
analytics.noData: No usage data yet. Start a chat to see analytics.
analytics.clearDataConfirm: This will permanently delete all analytics data. This action cannot be undone.
analytics.viewAnalytics: View usage analytics and cost tracking

plans.title: Scheduled Plans
plans.description: Schedule agents to run automatically with a specific prompt.
plans.deleteConfirm: This will permanently delete this plan and its execution history. This action cannot be undone.
plans.name: Name
plans.descriptionPlaceholder: Optional description of what this plan does
plans.promptPlaceholder: The message to send to the agent
plans.noPlans: No scheduled plans yet. Create one to automate your agents.
plans.browserWarning: Install the izan.io Chrome extension to enable scheduled plans. The extension runs plans in the background as long as Chrome is open - no need to keep this tab open.
plans.browserWarningExtension: Scheduled plans run in the background via the Chrome extension. Just keep Chrome running - you can close this tab.
